activities: We are a boutique marketing agency specializing in direct-to-patient and word-of-mouth initiatives for the Pharma, Biotech, and Medical Device industries.  As such, we routinely collect general marketing data relating to our clients as well as personal and health-related data provided by our patient ambassadors.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data, including name, email and mailing addresses, and phone numbers, and personal health information
recoursemech: We encourage people to raise any concerns using the contact information provided.  We will investigate and attempt to resolve any compaints or disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information in accordance with internal policies.  If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to dispute resolution through our chosen third party resolution provider, the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/Safe Harbor program).
